name: EquipmentState
title: equipmentState
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts that identify the status the equipment was in at the time the transaction was initiated.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the EQU segment.

concepts.definition: Software is ready, hardware not yet
Software and hardware are not yet ready
Software and hardware are ready, but user action is required to start
Successfully started, new orders can be accepted, currently no orders are present
Successfully started, new orders can be accepted
User action is required to continue
Error, remaining orders can be finished, new orders cannot be accepted
Failure, remaining orders are aborted, new orders cannot be accepted
For diagnostic instruments: some test types are unavailable
